snippet.title: Oddballers: Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Bend your knees and thrust your hips – it’s time for an intense dose of hard-hitting dodgeball action! 
OddBallers is a hilariously charming and totally bonkers multiplayer party game where each round is a new, absurd type of dodgeball. 
Gather your best frenemies and prepare to shave sheep with lawnmowers, tussle with tractors, slam stinky toilets -- and yes, throw dodgeballs -- to decide who’s the greatest player of them all! 

OddBallers is now available on Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Epic, Connect PC, Luna – available on Playstation 5 and Xbox Series X|S via backward compatibility
